content: 2 single_crochet in each st around total of 12 sts round 3 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 6 times total 18 sts round 4 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 6 times total 24 sts round 5 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 6 times total 30 sts fasten_off leave about 17 - 20 tail leaf make 2 color b yarn round 1 chain 12 1 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 treble_crochet in the next chain 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 single_crochet in the next chain working in the opposite of chain 1 single_crochet in the next chain this would be the same chain we just put the other single_crochet but now on the opposite side of the chain 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 treble_crochet in the next chain 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 chs 1 single_crochet in the last chain join with sl st to first single_crochet made total 22 sts fasten_off joining leaves together and vine color b yarn place the two leaves together right side at each ends/base join the leaves at the base where we started to create the leaf not where we fasten_off row 1 attach color b yarn through the ends/base of the leaves chain 45 1 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each chain to end of row join with a slip_stitch to the where we first attached the yarn to the leaves total 43 sts fasten_off attaching all pieces together with the tail we left from the crocheted back cover we will attach all pieces to the back of the flower first place the vine piece on the back of the flower about an inch on the center making sure that the leaves are on the wrong side face down dangling then place the crocheted back cover piece right side over the vine now proceed to sew all round the outer edge of the crocheted back cover piece to the flower fasten_off weave in the ends congratulations you are finished you made it how beautiful was that follow me here ravelry pinterest https //pin it/x5kanby instagram https //www instagram com/invites/contact/ i=1o9z4a0ba9njs&utm_content=mhvk8te @crochet&copy twitter https //twitter com/crochetandcopy t=fm7hjmbncdwyhbyqvbbnha&s=09 if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/wc0iqtxul_8
